name: CEFR A1 入门级
description: 欧洲语言共同参考框架 A1 级别基础词汇

examples.sentence: Can I have some water, please?
I want to thank my parents.
I made a new friend today.
examples.translation_cn: 我今天交了一个新朋友。
我昨天给妈妈打了电话。

examples.sentence: My father works in a bank.
My brother is older than me.
The girl is reading a book.
The man is wearing a hat.
People are waiting for the bus.
She wants to be a teacher.
I go to school every day.
There are 30 students in my class.
I need a pen to write.
The pencil is on the desk.
The book is on the table.
I can see the garden from the window.
I live in a big house.
Is there any room for me?
I go to bed at 10 o'clock.
Would you like a cup of tea?
Rice is very important in China.
I had an egg for breakfast.
There are many fish in the river.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
examples.translation_cn: 一天一苹果，医生远离我。

examples.sentence: I take the bus to school.
I go to work by train.
I ride my bike to school.
I live in a big city.

examples.translation_cn: 北京是一个美丽的城市。

examples.sentence: I see him once a week.
There are seven days in a week.
There are twelve months in a year.
I will see you next month.
I get up early in the morning.
I have class in the afternoon.
I watch TV in the evening.
I go to work every day.
He is looking for a job.
The sun rises in the east.

examples.translation_cn: 红色是我最喜欢的颜色。
黄色是一种明亮的颜色。

examples.sentence: She is wearing a white dress.
examples.translation_cn: 她穿着一条白色的裙子。

examples.sentence: I live in a big city.
I take the bus to work.
What do you want to eat?
Would you like something to drink?
I want to buy a book.

examples.translation_cn: 我能用一下你的手机吗？

examples.sentence: Put the book on the table.
There are seven days in a week.
I go to work at eight.
I go to bed at ten.
Do you have any other questions?
We are in the same class.
I have many things to do.
I want to see the world.
I want to see you again.

examples.translation_cn: 告诉我关于你自己的事情。

examples.sentence: The book is on the table.
I go to school on Monday.
I go to work by bus.
I like it, but it's expensive.
I am happy because I passed the exam.
examples.translation_cn: 我很高兴因为我通过了考试。

examples.sentence: I can't go because I am busy.
If you want, I can help.
examples.translation_cn: 如果你想的话，我可以帮忙。

examples.sentence: Call me if you need help.
examples.translation_cn: 如果你需要帮助就给我打电话。
